Very easy to clean (I hang it in the shower and use soap and the handheld showerhead to wash it then allow it to air dry); other times I opt for using the water hose. Be prepared, with this suit you will find yourself drenched with sweat! Happy sweating!
customer_reviews.author: cissarai

customer_reviews.title: It's good for my height of 5'5"
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Large. It's good for my height of 5'5". I ordered it based on the height and not the weight. I was 179lbs when I first order it and tried it on. I felt like a busted can of biscuits at first but once I started to lose weight it fit better in the middle. Also, I agree with another reviewer; it feels better to use spandex when I wear it. Does it help you sweat? Yes but it can also make you over heat. So know your body when using a product like this and don't ignore the signs its telling you.

customer_reviews.author: d1joeo

The extra heat helps me get loose faster. Overall, I'm very pleased with my purchase and I will be making additional purchases including just the shirt.

Im wondering if i bought the male size instead of the female size. Ive already worn it, so I think it's too late to return it. The other thing that i dont care for is that some of the stitches are poking my skin. Specifically at the edge of the arm and thigh seams. I'm dealing with it by wearing a long sleeve shirt and shorts beneath the outfit. Overall, I like the extra sweat that i get during my workouts.

If you are looking for a custom sauna suit, this isn't it, but then, I'm not sure they're even available. Of all on the market, this is the best overall. *I'm a personal trainer, martial artist, and fighter. I have used this product for everything from warmups to weight cuts.

Great buy. No regrets.

She's excited!
